name: book
look_description: You take out the suspicious book and turn it over. The Pale Horse. The book's binding is starting to come apart; clearly this book has been well loved. As you open up the book to thumb through its pages, a note flutters gently to the floor.

touch.text: The book is made of soft leather. It feels luxurious under your fingers, but the spine is bent out of shape.

smell.text: Smells like leather, paper, and a hint of... perfume?

read.text: As you open up the book to thumb through its pages, a letter flutters gently to the floor.
